name: Orc Clans
author: guitarninja#5707
background: The Orc Clans are a band of roving orcs who scrap, fight and die for the glory of it. Their origin is still unknown, but they are spread across the galaxy in wide numbers. Orcs usually gather with a steady amount of goblins who act as the workers and some even pilot goblin mech creations.

warlord.name: Warlord
warlord.description: The clan leader and toughest orc boss.

warlord_trike.name: Warlord on Trike
warlord_trike.description: A tough warboss mounted on a battle war trike.

shaman.name: Shaman
shaman.description: A strange orc with psychic powers.

mechanic.name: Mechanic
mechanic.description: An orc with a knack for scrapping and fixing things.

mad_doctor.name: Mad Doctor
mad_doctor.description: An orc with a knack for fixing up the wounded.

goblin_herder.name: Goblin Herder
goblin_herder.description: A orc tasked with herding and commanding lowly goblins.

orc_boss.name: Orc Boss
orc_boss.description: A boss ready to cause maximum havoc.

orc_boss_leader.name: Orc Boss Leader
orc_boss_leader.description: A boss leader ready to cause maximum havoc.

looter.name: Looter Orc
looter.description: An Orc obsessed with looting and upgrading weapons. Can be equipped for various specialist roles.

looter_leader.name: Looter Orc Leader
looter_leader.description: An Orc leader obsessed with looting and upgrading weapons. Can be equipped for various specialist roles.

looter_boss.name: Pirate Orc
looter_boss.description: A Pirate Orc obsessed with looting and upgrading weapons.

looter_boss_leader.name: Pirate Orc Leader
looter_boss_leader.description: A Pirate Orc leader obsessed with looting and upgrading weapons.

storm_orc.name: Storm Orc
storm_orc.description: An angry orc equipped with a jetpack.

storm_orc_leader.name: Storm Orc Leader
storm_orc_leader.description: An angry orc leader equipped with a jetpack.

ultra_boss.name: Ultra Boss
ultra_boss.description: An orc boss that is heavily armored and dangerous.

ultra_boss_leader.name: Ultra Boss Leader
ultra_boss_leader.description: An orc boss leader that is heavily armored and dangerous.

attack_beast.name: Attack Beast
attack_beast.description: A bouncing beast with gnashing teeth.

attack_beast_herder.name: Attack Beast Herder
attack_beast_herder.description: An orc herding a swarm of ravenous attack beasts.

orc_biker_leader.name: Orc Biker Leader
orc_biker_leader.description: An angry orc leader on bike.

boss_biker.name: Boss Biker
boss_biker.description: An orc boss mounted on a bike.

boss_biker_leader.name: Boss Biker Leader
boss_biker_leader.description: An orc boss leader mounted on a bike.

orc_minicopter.name: Orc Minicopter
orc_minicopter.description: A miniature helicopter for quick and deadly air attacks.

orc_minicopter_leader.name: Orc Minicopter Leader
orc_minicopter_leader.description: A miniature helicopter for quick and deadly air attacks.

attack_quad.name: Attack Quad
attack_quad.description: A small vehicle built to swiftly deploy devastating firepower.

grand_warlord_tactics.name: Grand Warlord Tactics
grand_warlord_tactics.description:
When this unit is activated, choose up to X friendly _Infantry_ units within 6" to receive one of the following bonuses until the end of the round: 
 * Re-roll all failed Accuracy tests 
 * Re-roll all failed Strength tests

speed_pole.name: Big Boss Pole
speed_pole.description: Friendly _Infantry_ units within 6" add +1" to their Movement characteristic.

goblin_tactics.name: Goblin Tactics
goblin_tactics.description:
When this unit is activated, choose up to X friendly _Goblin_ _Infantry_ units within 6" to receive one of the following bonuses until the end of the round: 
 * Re-roll failed Accuracy tests of 9+ 
 * Re-roll failed Initiative tests of 9+

orc_tactics.name: Orc Tactics
orc_tactics.description:
When this unit is activated, choose up to X friendly _Infantry_ units within 6" to receive one of the following bonuses until the end of the round: 
 * Re-roll failed Strength tests of 9+ 
 * Re-roll failed Initiative tests of 9+

tracks.name: Tracks
tracks.description: This unit may ignore difficult terrain and obstacles of height 2" or less when moving.

goblin_assistant.name: Goblin Assistant
goblin_assistant.description: Models in this unit gain +1 to Repair rolls.

orc_idol.name: Orc Idol
orc_idol.description: This model and friendly _Infantry_ units within 6" gain +1 Courage.

energy_field.name: Energy Field
energy_field.description: Once per round, a friendly _Infantry_ unit within 6" may gain +1 Save.

force_field.name: Force Field
force_field.description: Roll a die for each hit this model takes, on a 3 or less that hit is prevented.

war_banner.name: War Banner
war_banner.description: Once per round, a friendly _Infantry_ unit within 6" gains +1 AP on all Melee weapons.

icon.name: Icon
icon.description: Friendly units of X types within 6" may re-roll a single failed Courage test when removing Shock.

relic_killer_claw.name: The Killer Claw
relic_killer_claw.description: Replace one model's Heavy Energy Claw with The Killer Claw.
relic_killer_claw.flavor: This Claw is the most killy claw you've ever seen.

speed_pole.name: Big Boss Pole
speed_pole.description: Upgrade one Warlord model with The Big Boss Pole.
speed_pole.flavor: Nearby Orcs are filled with a zeal to charge forward and attack.

boom_cannon.name: The Boom Cannon
boom_cannon.description: Replace one model's Heavy Cannon with The Boom Cannon.
boom_cannon.flavor: A very scary cannon for pure destruction.

crunch.name: Crunch
crunch.description: Target enemy unit within 12" takes 4 hits with AP(1).

teleport.name: Jump Teleport
teleport.description: Target friendly unit within 12" may move up to 12" ignoring all models and terrain. This must end outside of 12" of any enemy units.

strength.name: Mighty Strength
strength.description: Target friendly unit within 12" gets +1 Strength until the end of the round.

here_we_go.name: Here We Go!
here_we_go.description: Use when a unit declares a Charge action. That unit gets +3" of Movement for that action.

ramshackle.name: Ramshackle
ramshackle.flavor: Many parts of Orc vehicles end up being less important than they seem, falling off without causing damage.
ramshackle.description: Use when a _Vehicle_ unit is targeted by an attack. For that attack, roll a D10 each time that unit is hit. On a 3 or less the hit is ignored.

tough_ones.name: Tough Ones
tough_ones.flavor: These Orcs are some of the toughest you've ever seen.
tough_ones.description: Use before taking Save rolls for an _Infantry_ unit. It gets +1 Save.

smash_them.name: Smash Them
smash_them.flavor: It's about time we got to fighting.
smash_them.description: Use when an _Infantry_ unit performs a Fight action. Hit rolls of 1 or 2 cause an additional hit.

counter_attack.name: Counter Attack
counter_attack.flavor: The toughest orcs never back down from a challenge.
counter_attack.description: Use when an _Infantry_ unit is targeted by a Fight action. If that unit has not yet activated, it may perform a Counter Attack reaction without testing Initiative.

quick_aim.name: Quick Aim
quick_aim.description: Use when an _Infantry_ unit with any _Assault_ weapons is firing. That unit does not suffer -1 to hit when using the _Assault_ rule.
quick_aim.flavor: These orcs are so used to firing from the hip while speeding their way upfield that their accuracy doesn't suffer.

run_them_down.name: Run Them Down
run_them_down.description: Use when a Vehicle or Super Heavy Vehicle makes a charge action. The Impact Rule gains +1 AP for the charge.
run_them_down.flavor: Those clans with a focus on speed enjoy putting a little extra oomph on their vehicles, making them hit just a little harder when they ram into something.

extra_juice.name: Extra Juice
extra_juice.description: Use when a unit makes a move action. It gains +3" move for that action
extra_juice.flavor: These orcs have either a special fuel or know little tricks to get them upfield just that little bit faster than their slower brethren.

indescriminate_fire.name: Indiscriminate Fire
indescriminate_fire.description: Use when shooting with an _Infantry_ unit. If the attack hits, assign 2 additional Shock.
indescriminate_fire.flavor: Firing mostly at random, it's enough to Shock most enemies.

good_shots.name: Good Shots
good_shots.description: Use when an _Infantry_ unit Shoots. That unit gets +1 Accuracy if it did not move this round.
good_shots.flavor: Experienced with ranged weapons, these Orcs can hit targets accurately.

tune_up.name: Tune Up
tune_up.description: Use before shooting with a unit. Add 3" to the short and long ranges of all weapons for that unit.
tune_up.flavor: Souped up and well-oiled, their weapons perform much better than any others.

ambush.name: Ambush
ambush.description: Up to half of any force's units, one point for each may be placed in _Ambush Reserves_ instead of deployed on the field.
ambush.flavor: A deadly ambush can catch many off guard.

concealment.name: Concealment
concealment.flavor: Orcs are sometimes trained in stealth tactics allowing them to hide even in plain sight.
concealment.description: Use this strategy when a unit is targeted by an enemy Shooting attack. That unit gets -1 Accuracy this attack.

stealth_assault.name: Stealth Assault
stealth_assault.flavor: Striking when the enemy least expects is a good way to quietly deal with an enemy.
stealth_assault.description: Use this strategy when an _Infantry_ unit charges. If the charging unit only makes a single move action this activation, enemy units may not react to that charge.

toughness.name: Toughness
toughness.description: Use when an _Infantry_ unit takes Save rolls. Roll a die for each hit this unit takes. On a 3 or less that hit is prevented.
toughness.flavor: These Orcs are particularly tough and can take a hit.

durability.name: Durability
durability.description: Use before activating a unit with a Damage Chart. That unit is treated as having no critical damage tokens for this activation.
durability.flavor: Some of the most well-maintained vehicles and machinery can operate under great stress.

piercing_blows.name: Piercing Blows
piercing_blows.flavor: These Orcs are so tough they can even pentrate some armor for extra damage.
piercing_blows.description: Use when an _Infantry_ unit performs a Fight action. Hit rolls of 1 or 2 gain +1 AP.

divine_intervention.name: Divine Intervention
divine_intervention.description: Use when taking a skill test. You may increase or decrease the result of that test by 1.
divine_intervention.flavor: Suddenly you witness the hand of fate intervene on your behalf.

scavenge.name: Scavenge
scavenge.description: Use when an _Infantry_ unit destroys a unit with a Damage Chart. That unit increases its Save by 1 for the rest of the game.
scavenge.flavor: These parts make great scavenged armor.

hop_on.name: Hop On
hop_on.description: Use when a _Vehicle_ unit performs a Move action within 3" of a friendly _Infantry_ unit. Place the _Infantry_ unit within 3" of the Vehicle's ending location.
hop_on.flavor: Hitching a ride on a vehicle is a great way to get across the battlefield.
